Title: Black Book
Actors: Carice van Houten, Sebastian Koch, Thom Hoffman, Halina Reijn
Plot: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 13 wins & 22 nominations.
Production: CoBo Fund, Motion Investment Group, Medienboard Berlin-Brandenburg, Le Tax Shelter du Gouvernement Fédéral de Belgique, Studio Babelsberg, MEDIA Programme of the European Union, Egoli Tossell Film, VIP 4 Medienfonds, Umedia, uFilm
